name: places/ChIJJbm7wChZwokRVlCG-jmej1I
formattedAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: I LOVE THE DOCTOR AND STAFF AT THIS OFFICE! As a first time mother I was so relieved to find such a great practice that value and respect their patients. Scheduling was super easy and every time I call with any questions or concerns I am able to get in contact with a staff member ASAP. During my first visit, wait time was not long at all and everyone from front desk, nurses and doctor Reena Parikh was informative, patient and very kind. I love this practice so much and feel so comfortable that I have a practice I can trust with my OB care! I definitely recommend Reena Parikh for your OB care. Her response time is fast when questions are asked, she's very educated/informative and, shows kindness and compassion towards her patients.

originalText.text:
Highly recommend Dr. Parikh. I transferred from another practice at 20 weeks and Dr. Parikh was welcoming and very knowledgeable. She responds to messages right away and has great bedside manner. Dr. Bradley, another doctor in the practice delivered my daughter as Dr. Parikh was not on call but she was also wonderful. Dr. Parikh came to visit me in the hospital after the baby was born and my first post partum visit went smoothly. I truly felt well taken care of during and after pregnancy with this provider!

My only issue is not with the provider but with scheduling. It was extremely difficult for me to make appointments even though they were weeks in advance and it was nearly impossible to reschedule appointments to another day the same week or even a different time. Keep that in mind when scheduling!

originalText.text: After having had a terrible experience with a few fervent doctor from a different organization. Dr Parikh has been a breath of fresh air. She has been on top of my care and has done such a phenomenal job at it. I would highly recommend her to everyone. Her mannerisms and bedside manner was just what I needed during this process.

text.text: After having had a terrible experience with a few fervent doctor from a different organization. Dr Parikh has been a breath of fresh air. She has been on top of my care and has done such a phenomenal job at it. I would highly recommend her to everyone. Her mannerisms and bedside manner was just what I needed during this process.

originalText.text: I strongly recommend Dr. Parikh. I’ve been to a few different OBs in NYC and then a different practice while I was briefly living in Maryland and I can hands down say Dr. Parikh is the best. She has gone out of her way to make me feel seen and heard since my first visit. She went above and beyond in helping me handle a recent complication. I work in the healthcare field and I can honestly say I’ve never had a provider be this attentive. I’ve already recommended her to all my friends.

originalText.text: Dr. Parikh is amazing, you can feel the great energy she brings to the room. Her bedside manners are impeccable coming from me as a bedside RN is top tier. She listens, she’s confident and extremely knowledgeable. Truly excited to continue my care with her !
